name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Channel Points Gift Box Plugin

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically clicks the channel point gift box for each tab that has a Twitch stream.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is used for Twitch to automatically collect the channel point gift boxes which award extra channel points to spend. These channel points can be used to purchase rewards from the streamer's channel for your dedication to their stream. The extension tracks how many gift boxes it has collected and runs in the background so all you have to do is open a new tab and navigate to the streamer(s) that you want to collect from. Spawn as many tabs as you want and it will collect the channel point gift boxes from each stream you have started!
